title: Complex Conjugate Function
description:
CCON calculated the conjugation of a complex number
CCON.RE = X.RE
CCON.IM = -X.IM
name: CCON

input.name: X
input.description: The input complex number for which the conjugate is to be calculated.

return_value.description: The complex conjugate of the input complex number.

fields.name: re
fields.description: The real part of the complex conjugate.

fields.name: im
fields.description: The imaginary part of the complex conjugate, which is the negation of the input's imaginary part.
